Posts.Content: Every Trust has a set Complaints policy. Written complaints have a set time frame in which they should be acknowledged. In my Trust a written complaint to theÂ  Lead nurse for the specific area with a copy to the lead for Clinical Governance and or Chairman should see a prompt reply. In my position at work I have to Investigate Complaints and they are taken very seriously.
